thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Gerald Shier (Proud Papa)
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Gerald Shier (Proud Papa)

author: Gerald Shier (Proud Papa)
title: Gerald Shier (Proud Papa)
text:
I ordered High Power YKS Lipo Battery 7.4V 1000mah 20C MAX 30C JST Plug for RC Airplane Helicopter Part (7.4V 1000mah 20C lipo battery,Lipo Battery 7.4V,RC Battery JST)
It arrived in about 10 days (actually arrived before the remote that it was purchased for).
High quality product. Works as expected.
Will purchase from Tomtop again.
